WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING.author: by Delia Owens Putnam
WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.

THE 18TH ABDUCTION.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro Little, Brown
THE 18TH ABDUCTION.description: The 18th book in the Women's Murder Club series. Lindsay Boxer investigates the disappearance of three female teachers.

REDEMPTION.author: by David Baldacci Grand Central
REDEMPTION.description: The fifth book in the Memory Man series. The first man Amos Decker put behind bars asks to have his name cleared.

NEON PREY.author: by John Sandford Putnam
NEON PREY.description: The 29th book in the Prey series. Lucas Davenport goes after a serial killer.

LOST ROSES.author: by Martha Hall Kelly Ballantine
LOST ROSES.description: In 1914, the New York socialite Eliza Ferriday works to help White Russian families escape from the revolution.

NORMAL PEOPLE.author: by Sally Rooney Hogarth
NORMAL PEOPLE.description: The connection between a high school star athlete and a loner ebbs and flows when they go to Trinity College in Dublin.

THE SILENT PATIENT.author: by Alex Michaelides Celadon
THE SILENT PATIENT.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.

A WOMAN IS NO MAN.author: by Etaf Rum Harper
A WOMAN IS NO MAN.description: A Palestinian-American teenager, much like her mother before her, faces the prospect of an arranged marriage.

FIRE AND BLOOD.author: by George R.R. Martin Bantam
FIRE AND BLOOD.description: The first volume of the two-part history of the Targaryens in Westeros.

SOMEONE KNOWS.author: by Lisa Scottoline Putnam
SOMEONE KNOWS.description: A dark secret emerges when Allie Garvey returns home to attend a childhood friendâ€™s funeral.
